'''''Touring Light Show''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Sumeru]] and [[Fontaine]].
==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A strange light has appeared out in the wild/underwater. Catch up with it, and you may yet net yourself some unexpected rewards...}}
# Complete light-chasing challenge 0/1
#* Interact with the [[Time Trial Challenge]] to start the challenge. The challenge will involve gliding through [[Anemo Ring]]s and [[Upcurrent]]s and using [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s to catch a strange light.
